newsitem.title: USA: Alternative Living Services sets debt sale.
newsitem.headline: Alternative Living Services sets debt sale.

text.p: Alternative Living Services Inc said Wednesday it will sell $50 million of seven percent convertible subordinated debentures due 2004, at par value. The transaction is expected to close May 21, 1997.

The company said it intends to use proceeds from this offering to develop and construct new residences, to acquire additional residences as appropriate opportunities arise, and for general working capital needs.
The debentures, which are non-callable for three years, will be convertible into common stock at a price of $20.25 per share. The debentures will convert into about 2,469,000 shares of common stock.

Neither the debentures nor the common stock issuable upon conversion has been registered under the United States Securities Act of 1933. They may not be offered or sold in the United States or to any U.S. individuals or institutional investors without a registration or an exemption from the registration requirements.
Alternative Living Services operates 88 residences in 14 states for the elderly and individuals with infirmities.
